title: Wanderer
description: A web app with Google Maps integration for seamless global exploration using location-based search for an engaging travel experience and pinpointing hospitalities on global-scale.

title: PixelShare
description: A secure MERN stack social media app with advanced authentication features, including password hashing and encryption, enabling users to create, share, and engage with posts.

title: Blog Here
description: A web application that enables users to publish blogs within their chosen interest categories and incorporating a commenting feature, fostering meaningful discussions.
